TopicTitle: Ask the Mods questions about the Forums!

Articles.Content:
The Curious George rank is (or was) the initial rank given to a new user.

That may have changed recently.

Happy landings!

@Starhawk bro why, just why?

Yeah it is now the Bottle Rocketeer

>

> 4 hours ago, The\_Arcitect said:
> 
> 
> What are the different titles for the fourms?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Members
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Moderator
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Lead Moderator
> 

There's also "SQUAD Staff", used for people who (unlike moderators) actually work for Squad.  ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")

Then there's "New Members", which is for brand-new members who haven't yet posted enough to get out of the queue, and still need to have their posts approved by a moderator.

Other than that, the ones you cite above pretty much cover it.  There are, technically speaking, a few other ones, but they're practically unused in the forums these days and aren't worth discussing in detail.
